channel.title: Recipe's
channel.description: Quick question, does a minecraft server have the recipies configured in the server or is it client sided? because just before i edited the client and i went on single player and i was making tnt and diamond blocks with dirt and sand.

item.title: Recipe's
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

PLayRooney:

Quick question, does a minecraft server have the recipies configured in the server or is it client sided? because just before i edited the client and i went on single player and i was making tnt and diamond blocks with dirt and sand.

I know there is something to do with recipes client sided, ive had the zombiecraft mod before and i could put the recipe in and it would show the guns and ammo in stuff in the crafting box, only i couldnt gain the item because the server didnt have support for it

Read full topic
